sections.value: Hey! I'm Sarthak, a midwest man in the big city. I moved to New York in 2017 after graduating from the University of Michigan. I love technology and building things. In my free time I like to binge new shows or movies, play games or read. I also love taking urban hikes throughout the city and taking photos with my mirrorless camera.

Currently I'm working as a full stack developer at Haven Life where I primarily focus on web development with React and Android with Java. I have also worked in machine learning and security. I love HCI and design.
